abstract: In this E.L.L. practice, students are asked to choose the correct meaning of words, identify the best headline for a New York Times article and express short- and long-term goals for themselves.

headline.main: E.L.L. Practice | Setting and Reaching Goals, in Soccer and in Life

snippet: In this E.L.L. practice, students are asked to choose the correct meaning of words, identify the best headline for a New York Times article and express short- and long-term goals for themselves.
